column4: Wonder what kernel version I have. I know there's a console command for it..
Hmm. Wonder what upgrading kernel would do...
More features? Or just fixes.. or more hardware support?
I heard it's better to install some things from SOURCE ... why? Like, for instance WINE.
for wine, the idea is that you could get the latest source and that the repositories would have an older version, however there are some "bleedin edge wine repositories" that have the latest one
